msbt.message: You can't start out the new year just lazing around. Get out there and breathe that new-year air!
What do you usually do for New Year's? I kick off every year with squats, but after thatI can't decide.
I wanna train for a decathlon this year, but I can't decide which sport to focus on first, !
Got a New Year's resolution? I do! I want 12-pack abs and triceps big enough to block out the sun!
Last year, my New Year's goal was "get buff." This year, it's "get ultra buff!"
